name: Brackets adventure
description:
The game "Brackets adventure" contains an exciting journey through cool and varied levels. You will face many different enemies and obstacles. And to get to the next level, the hero must collect stars and solve difficult puzzles to open the gate to the next stage.

Controls

arrow up - move up

arrow down - move down

arrow right - move right

arrow left - move left

esc - main menu

r - restart level
